1.verse_text: This is the word of the Lord which was revealed to Hosea son of Beeri during the time when Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah ruled Judah, and during the time when Jeroboam son of Joash ruled Israel.

When the Lord first spoke through Hosea, he said to him, “Go marry a prostitute who will bear illegitimate children conceived through prostitution, because the nation continually commits spiritual prostitution by turning away from the Lord .”
So Hosea married Gomer, the daughter of Diblaim. Then she conceived and gave birth to a son for him.

Then the Lord said to Hosea, “Name him ‘Jezreel,’ because in a little while I will punish the dynasty of Jehu on account of the bloodshed in the valley of Jezreel, and I will put an end to the kingdom of Israel.
At that time, I will destroy the military power of Israel in the valley of Jezreel.”

She conceived again and gave birth to a daughter. Then the Lord said to him, “Name her ‘No Pity’ (Lo-Ruhamah) because I will no longer have pity on the nation of Israel. For I will certainly not forgive their guilt.

But I will have pity on the nation of Judah. I will deliver them by the Lord their God; I will not deliver them by the warrior’s bow, by sword, by military victory, by chariot horses, or by chariots.”
When she had weaned ‘No Pity’ (Lo-Ruhamah) she conceived again and gave birth to another son.
Then the Lord said: “Name him ‘Not My People’ (Lo-Ammi), because you are not my people and I am not your God.”

(2:1) However, in the future the number of the people of Israel will be like the sand of the sea which can be neither measured nor numbered. Although it was said to them, “You are not my people,” it will be said to them, “You are children of the living God!”
Then the people of Judah and the people of Israel will be gathered together. They will appoint for themselves one leader, and will flourish in the land. Certainly, the day of Jezreel will be great!

3.verse_text: The Lord said to me, “Go, show love to your wife again, even though she loves another man and continually commits adultery. Likewise, the Lord loves the Israelites although they turn to other gods and love to offer raisin cakes to idols.”
So I paid fifteen shekels of silver and about seven bushels of barley to purchase her.
Then I told her, “You must live with me many days; you must not commit adultery or have sexual intercourse with another man, and I also will wait for you.”
For the Israelites must live many days without a king or prince, without sacrifice or sacred fertility pillar, without ephod or idols.
Afterward, the Israelites will turn and seek the Lord their God and their Davidic king. Then they will submit to the Lord in fear and receive his blessings in the future.

4.verse_text: Hear the word of the Lord , you Israelites! For the Lord has a covenant lawsuit against the people of Israel. nor do they acknowledge God. They resort to violence and bloodshed. and all its inhabitants will perish. The wild animals, the birds of the sky, for my case is against you priests! You have destroyed your own people! Because you refuse to acknowledge me, Because you reject the law of your God, I will reject your descendants. They have turned their glorious calling by pursuing other gods. take away the understanding of my people. they commit spiritual adultery against their God. they sacrifice under oak, poplar, and terebinth, It is true: “A people that lacks understanding will come to ruin!” Do not go up to Beth Aven! Soon the Lord will put them out to pasture like a lamb in a broad field! they will be brought to shame because of their idolatrous worship. For there is neither faithfulness nor loyalty in the land, and even the fish in the sea will perish. and the false prophets stumble with you; by failing to acknowledge me! I will reject you as my priests. the more they rebelled against me. into a shameful disgrace! their appetites long for their iniquity! I will punish them both for their ways, and I will repay them for their deeds. they will engage in prostitution, but not increase in numbers; because they have abandoned the Lord and their diviner’s staff answers with an oracle. The wind of prostitution blows them astray; and burn offerings on the hills; because their shade is so pleasant. As a result, your daughters have become cult prostitutes, and your daughters-in-law commit adultery! nor your daughters-in-law when they commit adultery. For the men consort with harlots, they sacrifice with temple prostitutes. do not let Judah become guilty! Do not journey to Gilgal! Do not swear, “As surely as the Lord lives!” Do not go near him! then engage in cult prostitution; they dearly love their shameful behavior.
There is only cursing, lying, murder, stealing, and adultery.
Do not let anyone accuse or contend against anyone else:
The more the priests increased in numbers,

5.verse_text: Hear this, you priests! Pay attention, you Israelites! Listen closely, O king! For judgment is about to overtake you! For you were like a trap to Mizpah, like a net spread out to catch Tabor. but I will discipline them all. the evil of Israel is not hidden from me. Israel has defiled itself. because a spirit of idolatry controls their heart, Israel and Ephraim will be overthrown because of their iniquity. Even Judah will be brought down with them. to seek the favor of the Lord , Soon the new moon festival will devour them and their fields. Sound the alarm in Beth Aven! Tremble in fear, O Benjamin! What I am declaring to the tribes of Israel will certainly take place! I will pour out my rage on them like a torrential flood! because he was determined to pursue worthless idols. like wood rot to the house of Judah. then Ephraim turned to Assyria, and begged its great king for help. He cannot cure your wound! until they have suffered their punishment. Then they will seek me;
Those who revolt are knee-deep in slaughter,

I know Ephraim all too well; For you have engaged in prostitution, O Ephraim; and they do not acknowledge the Lord . They will not find him – he has withdrawn himself from them! because they bore illegitimate children. Sound the trumpet in Ramah! and Judah saw his wound, But he will not be able to heal you! like a young lion to the house of Judah. I myself will tear them to pieces, then I will carry them off, and no one will be able to rescue them! in their distress they will earnestly seek me.
Their wicked deeds do not allow them to return to their God;

Although they bring their flocks and herds
They have committed treason against the Lord ,

6.verse_text: “Come on! Let’s return to the Lord ! He himself has torn us to pieces, but he will heal us! but he will bandage our wounds! so that we may live in his presence. He will come to our rescue as certainly as the appearance of the dawn, as certainly as the winter rain comes, as certainly as the spring rain that waters the land.” What am I going to do with you, O Judah? lying in ambush to pounce on a victim. They commit murder on the road to Shechem; they have done heinous crimes! there Ephraim practices temple prostitution and Judah defiles itself. He has injured us, he will heal us in a little while, Let us seek to acknowledge the Lord ! For your faithfulness is as fleeting as the morning mist; it disappears as quickly as dawn’s dew! I will certainly kill you in fulfillment of my oracles of judgment; for my judgment will come forth like the light of the dawn. I delight in acknowledging God, not simply in whole burnt offerings. Oh how they were unfaithful to me! its streets are stained with bloody footprints! Whenever I want to restore the fortunes of my people,
He will restore us in a very short time;
What am I going to do with you, O Ephraim?
Therefore, I will certainly cut you into pieces at the hands of the prophets;
For I delight in faithfulness, not simply in sacrifice;
At Adam they broke the covenant;
Gilead is a city full of evildoers;
The company of priests is like a gang of robbers,
I have seen a disgusting thing in the temple of Israel:
I have appointed a time to reap judgment for you also, O Judah!

14.verse_text: Return, O Israel, to the Lord your God, for your sin has been your downfall! Say to him: “Completely forgive our iniquity; accept our penitential prayer, that we may offer the praise of our lips as sacrificial bulls. For only you will show compassion to Orphan Israel!” and love them freely, for my anger will turn away from them. he will send down his roots like a cedar of Lebanon. they will plant and harvest grain in abundance. I am like a luxuriant cypress tree; your fruitfulness comes from me! Let him discern these things!
Return to the Lord and repent!

Assyria cannot save us; we will not ride warhorses. We will never again say, ‘Our gods’ to what our own hands have made. he will blossom like a lily, his splendor will be like an olive tree, his fragrance like a cedar of Lebanon. They will blossom like a vine, and his fame will be like the wine from Lebanon. I will answer him and care for him. Who is discerning? Let him understand them! For the ways of the Lord are right; the godly walk in them, but in them the rebellious stumble.
I will be like the dew to Israel;
People will reside again in his shade;
